Operation 'post_/regression/api' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context, not_actionable, poor_ai_interpretability. The current summary is passive and vague ('Returns regression analysis'). The description is completely empty, providing no guidance for AI agents. The improved summary uses action-oriented language ('Perform') and specifies the operation's purpose. The description explains what inputs are expected (variables and outcomes), what the operation does (identifies significant effects), and what is returned (coefficients, statistics, rankings). This aligns with the API's stated purpose of determining which variables most affect outcomes, uses domain-appropriate terminology (regression coefficients, standardized coefficients, R-squared, p-values), and provides clear context for AI agent decision-making about when to invoke this operation.

data.summary_suggestion: Perform regression analysis on variables and outcomes
data.description_suggestion: Executes a regression analysis to identify which contributing variables have the most significant effect on a specified outcome variable. Accepts a dataset with independent variables and a dependent outcome variable. Returns regression coefficients, standardized coefficients, statistical measures (R-squared, p-values), and variable importance rankings. Use this operation to determine variable relationships and predictive power in your data.
